text:
e="preserve">Michael Joseph Cullen (born 3 July 1931) is a Scottish former footballer. He played for Luton Town and Grimsby Town.
Cullen was born in Glasgow. At the age of 17, he signed for English Second Division side Luton Town in 1948.
In 1956, he became the only Luton Town player ever to be capped by Scotland. He was sold to Grimsby Town in 1958, and after a successful career there he moved on to Derby County.
He moved on to Wellington Town, where he played out his career.
